name: the horse riding person and the bear - chapter 1: curiosity
description: ever since childhood the person had heard: "beware, beware, here comes the bear". but one day he noticed that bears also cry and bearing his feelings -some very bear-like- he fled to the woods so a bear he could find. "behold, behold, your horse he beheaded" said the owl with a grin, but owls are liars like media and kings.
